attributes.action: Allow gay marriage in Northern Ireland
attributes.background: Up until recently the northern Irish governments biggest political party (DUP) have abused their power using a petition of concern to stop same sex marriage. however now since they do have 30 seats they cannot use it and I ask that this is to be reconsidered.

rejection.details:
Your petition is about something that the Northern Ireland Assembly is responsible for.

If you'd like to send your petition to the Northern Ireland Assembly, you can find the contact details here:

http://www.niassembly.gov.uk/about-the-assembly/contact-us/
